fullText:
Prime Beast Strike

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Halfling, ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit: If none of your allies is nearer to your target than either you or your beast companion, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with melee and ranged attacks against that target.


Revision (11/30/2009)
Page 7: Prime Beast Strike: Remove Prime Shot class feature from the prerequisites. Change benefit to, If none of your allies is nearer to your target than either you or your beast companion, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with melee and ranged attacks against that target.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381, page(s) 83.
name: Prime Beast Strike
prerequisite: Halfling, ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
benefit: If none of your allies is nearer to your target than either you or your beast companion, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with melee and ranged attacks against that target.
